original_text: Again, take a few of these and throw them into the fire and burn them up. A fire will spread from there to all Israel.
korean_text: 또 그 가운데에서 얼마를 불에 던져 사르라 그 속에서 불이 이스라엘 온 족속에게로 나오리라

sentences.original_text: Again, take a few of these
sentences.korean_translation: 다시, 이것들 중 몇 개를 가져라

sentences.original_text: and throw them into the fire
A fire will spread from there
